results.content: There is a lot of good information in this training but there are several places where the trainer makes mistakes and then just corrects them off line and continues without explaining what the mistake was or how he corrected it. Also in the Video hosting section a bunch of errors show on screen and he says that you can easily fix if you have knowledge of PHP.ini but does not explain what is causing the error or how to correct it.

results.content: This course really took me from knowing nothing to "thinking like drupal". projects weren't full but was enough as an educational tutorial. I was looking for more details about registration and login system. I enjoyed the course and would recommend it to beginners.
results.content_html: This course really took me from knowing nothing to "thinking like drupal". projects weren't full but was enough as an educational tutorial. I was looking for more details about registration and login system. I enjoyed the course and would recommend it to beginners.

results.content: The course started well with the instructor briefly explaining what is Drupal and so, however when I got to the good parts creating Drupal implementations, the instructor didn’t explain anything clear, and suddenly I found myself following the instructor through heavy configurations screens (selecting options and typing text) without understand what I was doing.
results.content_html: The course started well with the instructor briefly explaining what is Drupal and so, however when I got to the good parts creating Drupal implementations, the instructor didn’t explain anything clear, and suddenly I found myself following the instructor through heavy configurations screens (selecting options and typing text) without understand what I was doing.

results.content: Content is great, the lessons are straight forward, and the instructor is very knowledgeable. My only gripe is that he speaks a little too fast and can be a bit difficult to understand at times.

results.content: The instructor is hard to follow. He speaks very fast and says a lot of extra words that aren't relevant. It sounds rushed. He makes a lot of spelling mistakes. His code is sloppy and poorly formatted. He doesn't give any context as to why we are doing things a certain way. But he is clearly knowledgeable about the subject matter so at least there's that. Thinking about bailing.
